MOSQITO

Created on Mon Nov 16 11:02:48 2020

@author: wantysal

amp2db(amp, ref=1)[source]

Conversion of an amplitude value into dB

Parameters:

amp: np.array

amplitude values to be converted

ref: float

reference value

bark2freq(bark_axis)[source]

Frequency conversion from Bark to Hertz

See E. Zwicker, H. Fastl: Psychoacoustics. Springer,Berlin, Heidelberg, 1990. The coefficients are linearly interpolated from the values given in table 6.1.

bark_axisnumpy.array

Bark frequencies to be converted

freq_axisnumpy.array

frequencies converted in Hertz

db2amp(dB, ref=1)[source]

Linearisation of a SPL level in dB

Parameters:

  • dB (numpy.array) – dB values to be converted

  • ref (float) – reference value

freq2bark(freq_axis)[source]

Frequency conversion from Hertz to Bark

See E. Zwicker, H. Fastl: Psychoacoustics. Springer,Berlin, Heidelberg, 1990. The coefficients are linearly interpolated from the values given in table 6.1.

freq_axisnumpy.array

Hertz frequencies to be converted

bark_axisnumpy.array

frequencies converted in Bark

spectrum2dBA(spectrum, fs)[source]

A_weighting dB ponderation of a spectrum according to CEI 61672:2014

Third-octave spectrum are directly calculated, other are calculated using linear interpolation.

Parameters:

  • spectrum (numpy.array) – input spectrum

  • fs (integer) – sampling frequency
